trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IConnectionPointContainer`MSDN 库的 com 子文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enumerator of all the connection points supported in the connectable object, one connection point per IID.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举器可连接对象中, 所支持的所有连接点的每个 IID 的一个连接点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer::EnumConnectionPoints` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IConnectionPointContainer::EnumConnectionPoints`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, contains the interface pointer of the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 在成功返回时，包含枚举器的接口指针。

trans-unit.source: Asks the connectable object if it has a connection point for a particular IID, and if so, returns the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPoint" name="IConnectionPoint" href=""></xref> interface pointer to that connection point.
trans-unit.target: 要求可连接对象，如果它还具有一个连接点用于特定的 IID，如果是这样，将返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPoint" name="IConnectionPoint" href=""></xref>与该连接点的接口指针。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPointContainer::FindConnectionPoint` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IConnectionPointContainer::FindConnectionPoint`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the outgoing interface IID whose connection point is being requested.
trans-unit.target: 传出接口 IID 正在请求其连接点的引用。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, contains the connection point that manages the outgoing interface `riid`.
trans-unit.target: 在成功返回时，包含管理输出接口的连接点`riid`。
